column5: MTP sorry to say but she can go down to 12 13 and stay there for a very long time still holding but i dont believe in this stock any moreGood Fundamentals or not it was a BIG mistake Not to Cut her much sooner when i still had some in iti just hope that MTP will stay in my as A reminder of CUT YOUR LOSSif it will improve my Trading then it was worth itGood luck to All
